resources.string: "Your GPS seems to be disabled. Kindly enable GPS and set it to High Accuracy."
"OOHANA needs the necessary permissions to proceed."
"Kindly switch GPS settings to High Accuracy."
"Are you sure you want to stop the logs?"
"OOHANA needs to get the geofences from the server. Kindly connect to the internet."
Logs have been successfully synced to server!
Geofences have been successfully synced to server!
